input:
[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8]
output:
5

input:
[1,3,7,11,12,14,18]
output:
3

input:
[1,3,5]
output:
0

input:
[2,5,6,11,13,14,15,17,18,20,22,27,28,31,32,33,38,41,45,46,50,51,55,56,58,61,68,69,73,77,78,84,96,97,107,114,118,122,128,135,151,154,163,166,182,199,206,219,250,263,270,296,321,334,354,404,429,433,478,520,540,573,692,703,774,841,927,1121,1136,1252,1361,1500,1813,1839,2202,2427,2934,2975,3563,3927,4747,4814,5765,6354,7681,7789,9328,10281,12428,12603,15093,16635,20109,20392,24421,26916,32537,39514,52646,63935]
output:
